	- ensure(sender) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Mars.sol#79)
		- require(bool)(Governance(_governance).isPartner(sender)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Mars.sol#105)

	- _balances[sender] = _balances[sender].sub(amount,ERC20: transfer amount exceeds balance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Mars.sol#83)
	- _balances[recipient] = _balances[recipient].add(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Mars.sol#84)
